version_description:
The Journey Continues!
We’ve been busy working on some awesome updates for your Bird Flinging needs
- Birdie’s Kiosk is open for business! Collect Apples and spend them on rewards!
- New Avatars! Our Birds are happy to help you look dapper.
- Fixes for various glitches and freezes that have been preventing a smooth gaming experience.

The Journey Continues! 
We’ve been busy working on awesome updates for your Bird Flinging needs.
- Switch-a-Block! This new magical block changes the materials of the surrounding blocks to match its type
- Browse completed episodes to see all the cool bits of the Journey
- Level updates for a smoother gameplay experience
- Squashed bugs, and other fixes to keep your cart wheels rolling

The Journey Continues!
We’ve been busy working on awesome updates for your Bird Flinging needs:
- NEW Cloud Blocks! Immune to physical damage, cloud blocks never fall - fling a Bird through them to clear them!
- DOUBLE the content! 20 new exciting levels every week!
- Enter the Elephant Oasis in Starry Desert Episode 4!
- Mask of Mischief is not a level goal anymore, but will still mess with you with its mist!
- Level updates and bug fixes to keep your cart wheels rolling

The Journey Continues!
We’ve been busy cookin' up some awesome updates for your Bird Flinging needs:
- Coming SOON... Helmet Pig! He can take big falls and handle extra hits. Knock off his helmet to bring him in line! 
- NEW World... Sleepy Meadows! Unlocks September 27th
- Level updates for a smoother gameplay experience
- Squashed the bug which occasionally made pigs and other goals invincible!
- Various other fixes to keep your cart wheels rolling!

The Journey Continues!
We’ve been busy cookin' up some awesome updates for your Bird Flinging needs:
- Coming SOON... Helmet Pig! He can take big falls and handle extra hits. Knock off his helmet to bring him in line! 
- NEW World... Sleepy Meadows! Unlocks September 27th
- Level updates for a smoother gameplay experience
- Squashed the bug which occasionally made pigs and other goals invincible!
- Various other fixes to keep your cart wheels rolling!

The Journey Continues!
We’ve been busy cookin' up some awesome updates for your Bird Flinging needs:
- Custom nicknames are here! Finally you can use that secret alias!
- Now Birds BOUNCE off the backwall! We can't wait to see your genius trick shots. 
- A very special episode of Sleepy Meadows is here... Episode 2!
- Squashed the bug where Builder Pig occasionally freezes levels
- Various other fixes to keep your cart wheels rollin'!

The journey goes global!
Thanks for supporting us as we ironed things out; you got us here!
For this milestone we’ve been cooking up some awesome updates: 
 - Inbox! For important messages and delivering goodies.
 - NEW Feature! Coming on Valentine's Day: Your very own Frog prince...and he's hungry! 
Blast him away before he swallows the Hatchlings!
 - A very special episode of Sacred Springs also comes out on Feb 14th!

The journey continues!
- NEW Soothing and Zen episode of Sacred Springs coming soon!
- Smarter fireflies! Now they navigate better around large objects to reach their soulmate!
- Red’s special power got more accurate and deals the correct damage
- Level updates for a smoother gameplay experience
- Fewer bugs and more fixes to keep your cart wheels rolling!

The journey continues!
 - Level updates for a smoother gameplay experience
 - Fewer bugs, and more fixes to keep your cart wheels rolling

"The journey continues!
- Help the Birds out of a jam! Blast through ALL-NEW Sticky Blocks that have flipped piggy towers upside down. But as sticky as they are, they're no match for an Angry Bird!
- NEW Chapter! The Birds head out West on an adventure through the Rocky Canyons! Watch out for rattlesnakes and greedy prospecting Pigs!
- Level updates for a smoother gameplay experience
- Fewer bugs and more fixes to keep your cart wheels rolling!"

The journey continues!
- Go on an Easter Egg Hunt! Look for Easter Eggs as you play levels. Collect as many as you can and trade them in for special goodies at the Easter Kiosk. Special seasonal event runs only April 14-19, so spring into action!
- Fewer bugs and more fixes to keep your cart wheels rolling!

The journey continues!
- Go on an Easter Egg Hunt! Look for Easter Eggs as you play levels. Collect as many as you can and trade them in for special goodies at the Easter Kiosk. Special seasonal event runs only April 14-19, so spring into action!
- Fewer bugs and more fixes to keep your cart wheels rolling!
